OUR GUARANTEE ON ALL FINANCED VEHICLES SOLD:

3.	Battery check by regional battery fitment centre

We also offer same day sales transaction and a nationwide business service subject to terms and conditions. Bank finance available and Trade-ins are welcome. Please Call one of our professional sales executives for assistance.

All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. Contact us today for an unbeatable quote. attributes.description: Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why AGG Westrand offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery. You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through AGG Westrand Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today
